name: opencode-smart-title
description: Automatically generate meaningful and descriptive titles for your OpenCode sessions based on conversation context, making it easy to find and organize past work.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable automatic intelligent session title generation based on conversation content.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-smart-title
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-smart-title"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to activate automatic title generation.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

The plugin automatically generates descriptive session titles based on your conversation:

### Before
```
Session: Untitled-2024-01-11-143022
```

### After
```
Session: Refactor authentication module with JWT
```

### How It Works
- Analyzes conversation context and code changes
- Generates concise, meaningful titles
- Updates automatically as the session progresses
- Helps you quickly identify past work

### Benefits
- No more generic "Untitled" sessions
- Easier to find relevant past conversations
- Better session organization
- Saves time when reviewing work history

No manual configuration needed - just install and the plugin handles the rest!
